description:
üêçüêç Pycon Colombia 2023 in this edition brings guests from another dimension, This year, we will have the participation of Travis Oliphant, he is the Founder and CEO of OpenTeams and Quansight.  He has spent over 25 years in the open source software scientific computing sector as the creator of NumPy, SciPy, Conda, and Numba and as a Founder of Anaconda (Continuum Analytics), NumFOCUS, and PyData. He has B.S. degrees in Electrical and Computer Engineering and Math, as well as an M.S. in Electrical and Computer Engineering from Brigham Young University and a Ph.D. in Biomedical Engineering from the Mayo Clinic.  He is deeply interested in helping domain experts use Python more effectively to fully utilize hardware by leveraging the power of open source communities.

title: Keynote - Tavis Oliphant
